reviews.comment: Amazing flavors! The lavender honey is to die for. Staff are super friendly too.
Great ice cream, but the lines can get pretty long on weekends.
Love the organic selection, but prices are quite high.
Overpriced and limited selection. The produce wasn't as fresh as expected.
Perfect spot for remote work! Fast WiFi, great coffee, and plenty of outlets.
Excellent atmosphere for working. Coffee is top-notch. Gets a bit noisy during lunch.
My go-to cafe for client meetings. Professional vibe and excellent service.
Nice concept but very limited sizes available. Staff could be more helpful.
Disappointing quality for the price. Leggings started pilling after first wash.
Expected better from a sustainable brand. Return policy is terrible.
Best poutine I've ever had! The maple bacon burger is incredible too.
Absolutely perfect! Creative menu and everything tastes amazing. A must-visit!
Wonderful independent bookstore! Great selection and the staff really know their books.
Cozy atmosphere, excellent curation. Love their monthly book club events!
Great selection of eco-friendly electronics. Staff are knowledgeable about products.
Good concept and helpful staff, though prices are a bit steep.
Very disappointing. Booked a massage and the therapist was 30 minutes late. No apology.
Overpriced and underwhelming. The facility needs updating and staff seem disorganized.
Authentic Italian food! The carbonara is excellent. Service can be slow when busy.
Good pasta, reminds me of home. Portions could be bigger for the price though.
Amazing store! They have everything my dog needs and the grooming service is fantastic.
Great selection of premium pet foods. Staff are very knowledgeable about animal nutrition.
Best coffee in the neighborhood! The croissants are fresh and flaky. Highly recommend.
Great coffee and friendly baristas. Limited seating though.
Found the perfect dress here! Love supporting local designers. Will definitely be back.
Unique pieces you won't find anywhere else. A bit pricey but worth it for quality.
Creative menu but execution is hit or miss. Some rolls were great, others were bland.
Expected better based on reviews. Sushi wasn't very fresh and service was slow.
Great learning environment. Instructors are experienced and curriculum is up-to-date.
Good bootcamp but very intensive. Be prepared to dedicate a lot of time.
Relaxing experience! The massage was incredible and the atmosphere is so calming.
Great spa treatments. A bit expensive but you get what you pay for.
Worth the drive! Great burgers and friendly service.
Everything on the menu is fantastic! Can't wait to come back and try more dishes.
My favorite bookstore in Toronto! Always discover new authors here.
Hands down the best dim sum in Markham. Har gow wrappers are perfectly thin and the shrimp inside is fresh. We come every Sunday morning!
The turnip cake here is exceptional — crispy outside, tender inside, and the XO sauce pairing is genius. Waits can be long but it's always worth it.
Very authentic flavors that remind me of Hong Kong. The BBQ pork bao is fluffy and perfectly sweet. Service is fast even when it's packed.
Brought my parents here from Vancouver and they said it's better than most places back home. The egg tarts are a must-order. Highly recommend!
Great dim sum but the parking can be a nightmare on weekends. Food quality is consistently excellent though.
I've tried every dim sum spot in the GTA and this is my top pick. Fresh ingredients, generous portions, and reasonable prices for the quality.
The siu mai here has the perfect ratio of pork to shrimp. Love that they still use the traditional cart system — adds to the experience!
Solid dim sum experience overall. The sesame balls were a little doughy but everything else was on point. Will definitely return.
Found a USB hub here for way less than anywhere online. The sheer variety of gadgets and accessories is unmatched. Fun to just browse.
Got a custom phone case printed in 30 minutes. Great selection, super helpful vendor, and prices were much better than any big box store.
Some stalls are great deals, others are overpriced. You really have to shop around. The earbuds I bought work great though.
An experience unlike anything else in Canada. The mall itself is worth visiting just to see. Picked up some great accessories at fair prices.
Great place to find hard-to-find charging cables and adapters. The staff at most stalls are knowledgeable. Parking is tricky on weekends.
This place is a hidden gem for tech accessories. Found a bamboo laptop stand that costs $80 elsewhere for only $38. Will keep coming back.
Quality varies a lot between vendors. Some items feel cheap. But if you know what to look for, there are genuine bargains here.
This is the most authentic ramen I've had outside of Japan. The tonkotsu broth is incredibly rich and the chashu pork melts in your mouth.
The spicy miso ramen is absolutely incredible. The noodles have the perfect springy texture. Gyoza was also a highlight — crispy and juicy.
Really great ramen! My only complaint is the portion size could be a bit bigger for the price. But the flavor is absolutely on point.
Been to ramen spots across Toronto and nothing comes close to Sakura. The karaage chicken is also incredible — best side dish I've had in years.
Solid ramen with great broth. Service was quick and friendly. The restaurant fills up fast so go early or be prepared to wait.
My new Markham obsession. The 18-hour broth makes all the difference — it's so much deeper and richer than other ramen places.
The brown sugar milk tea here is the BEST I've had anywhere in the GTA. Perfect sweetness, chewy boba, and the tiger stripes are gorgeous.
Finally a boba place that lets you fully customize! I got 30% sweetness and it was perfect. The taro milk tea is creamy and not overly sweet.
Great variety of teas and toppings. The mango yakult is refreshing and unique. Lines can get long after school hours.
I've dragged all my coworkers here and everyone loves it. The matcha latte with oat milk is silky smooth. Best boba in Markham hands down.
Love this place! The popping boba in the mango yakult is such a fun touch. Consistent quality every visit.
Come here at least twice a week. Staff is friendly and fast. Never had a bad drink here. The brown sugar milk tea is life-changing.
Excellent boba! The pearls are always perfectly cooked — not too chewy, not too soft. My go-to spot for afternoon treats.
Tried the seasonal cherry blossom milk tea and it was gorgeous both visually and taste-wise. This place really puts thought into their creations.
Really good boba overall. Pricing is fair for Markham. The only thing I'd improve is slightly faster service during peak hours.
The AYCE dinner here is incredible value. The quality of meat is way above other AYCE spots. The premium wagyu add-on is 100% worth it.
Best Korean BBQ in the GTA. The banchan side dishes alone are worth coming for — so many varieties and all delicious. Staff are attentive and helpful with the grill.
Fantastic meat quality and great atmosphere. Loved the seafood platter add-on. A bit pricey for AYCE but the quality justifies it.
Brought a group of 10 here for my birthday and everyone was blown away. The marinated short ribs are phenomenal. Ventilation is great too — no smoky smell after.
I've been to Korean BBQ all over Toronto and Markham and this is my definitive number one. Fresh ingredients, great service, and the grills are always clean.
Really enjoyable experience. The pork belly was perfectly cooked and the dipping sauces were wonderful. Slightly long wait on weekends but worth it.
Outstanding quality for AYCE. The beef bulgogi is tender and full of flavor. Staff replaced our grill multiple times without being asked — very professional.
My favorite restaurant in Markham, full stop. Every single visit has been perfect. The kimchi fried rice to finish off the meal is the best touch.
Great experience overall. Lamb skewers were a nice surprise on the menu. Only minor issue was the wait time for the seafood platter refill.
Brought my Korean in-laws here and even they were impressed. That's saying a lot! The broth for the stews is incredibly authentic.
The pineapple bun with thick-cut butter is absolutely perfect. They do it the proper Hong Kong way — crispy top, soft inside, generous butter.
The Swiss roll cake is amazing — light and creamy without being too sweet. The bread is always fresh and soft. A great neighborhood bakery.
I stop here every Saturday morning. The coconut tarts are exceptional and the pastries come out of the oven still warm. Best bakery in Markham.
Authentic HK-style baking. The bolo bao is always fresh and the egg tarts are perfectly custardy. Reasonable prices too.
This bakery transports me straight back to Hong Kong. Everything is made fresh daily and the quality shows. The wife cookies are also incredible!
Great bakery! The Swiss roll is a little pricey but it's genuinely high quality. The staff are always friendly and happy to suggest items.
A true treasure trove on the most charming street in Ontario. Found a gorgeous 1940s ceramic figurine for my collection. The owner's knowledge of each piece is remarkable.
I've been collecting for 30 years and this shop always surprises me. The vintage postcard sets are a steal. Worth the trip to Unionville alone.
Beautiful shop with carefully curated pieces. The Art Deco prints are stunning. Prices are fair for the quality. A must-visit on Main Street Unionville.
Bought a beautiful restored pocket watch here as a wedding gift. The owner took the time to explain its history and provenance. Exceptional service.
Lovely shop in a lovely location. Good variety of pieces across different eras. I found a beautiful 1960s ceramic that's now the centerpiece of my living room.
Finally fixed my chronic knee pain after years of suffering. The initial assessment was incredibly thorough and my treatment plan was tailored perfectly.
Incredible team of physiotherapists. They helped me recover from a torn ACL faster than I thought possible. Genuinely changed my quality of life.
Very professional clinic with modern equipment. The sports massage is excellent. Appointments are easy to book and the staff are always on time.
Best physiotherapy experience I've had in Ontario. The acupuncture sessions have been transformative for my back pain. Highly recommend to anyone.
My sports physiotherapist here is exceptional. She understood my running goals and created a program that had me back on the road in half the expected time.
Came here for shoulder impingement and the results have been outstanding. The team combines modern techniques with a holistic approach. Worth every penny.
Solid clinic with knowledgeable staff. Parking is convenient. My follow-up sessions are always efficient and I leave feeling noticeably better.
The beef noodle soup here is the best I've had outside of Taiwan. Rich, deeply spiced broth with fall-apart tender beef. This is comfort food perfection.
Authentic Taiwanese flavors at reasonable prices. The scallion pancake is crispy and flaky — perfect with a cup of hot tea.
Finally found a place in Markham that makes oyster vermicelli the right way. The shaved ice in summer is also absolutely incredible.
Great Taiwanese food. The portions are generous and the flavors are spot on. Service can be a bit slow when busy but the food is worth the wait.
Loved the scallion pancake and the beef noodle soup. The restaurant is small and cozy. Great value for authentic home-style Taiwanese cooking.
Every dish we tried was excellent. The shaved ice dessert is a must-have in summer — refreshing, not too sweet, and beautifully presented.
Got the ceramic coating done here and my car looks absolutely brand new. Incredible attention to detail. Worth every penny of the investment.
The full interior detail transformed my car after years of use. Stains I thought were permanent are completely gone. Outstanding work.
Excellent service and great results. The paint correction removed swirl marks that had been bothering me for years. Professional and efficient team.
Best detailing shop in Markham. My 10-year-old car looked showroom-ready when it came out. The staff took so much pride in their work.
Very happy with the basic wash and wax package. Good communication throughout and the car was done on time. Will upgrade to ceramic next time.
The instructors here are truly exceptional. I've been doing yoga for 10 years and this is the best studio I've ever attended. Small class sizes mean you actually get feedback.
Started with a 10-class pass and immediately signed up for monthly unlimited. The pilates classes have improved my posture and core strength dramatically.
Lovely studio with clean, well-maintained equipment. The evening restorative yoga class is my weekly treat. Very calming atmosphere.
As someone new to yoga I was nervous, but the instructors are so welcoming and patient. The beginner flow class is perfectly paced. Love this studio.
The private instruction sessions are absolutely worth it. My instructor tailored the entire session to my goals and I made more progress in one session than months of group classes.
Great studio. The barre class is surprisingly challenging but so effective. Good online booking system and staff are friendly and professional.
This studio has genuinely changed my relationship with fitness. I come out of every class feeling strong and centered. The monthly unlimited membership is a great deal.
Exceptional quality instruction across all the class types I've tried. Hot yoga here is particularly well-run — the temperature is consistent and the sequences are challenging.
Hive redesigned our website and the results exceeded every expectation. Traffic doubled in 3 months and we've received so many compliments from clients.
Very professional team. The branding package they created for our startup is exactly what we envisioned. They were responsive and delivered on time.
The SEO audit they performed opened our eyes to so many missed opportunities. After implementing their recommendations, our search rankings improved significantly.
Solid agency for Markham businesses. Our social media engagement has tripled since they took over management. Good communication throughout the process.
As a small business owner I was skeptical, but Hive Creative has been transformative for our online presence. ROI on their services has been outstanding.
The maple walnut fudge is incredible — rich, creamy, and intensely maple-flavored. Bought a sampler box as a gift and everyone loved it. Perfect Niagara souvenir.
The best fudge on Clifton Hill by far. Made fresh daily and you can actually taste the difference. The rocky road is dangerously addictive.
Quality fudge at fair prices for a tourist area. The cookies and cream variety is our family favorite. We buy a box every time we visit Niagara.
Genuinely the best fudge I've ever tasted. The texture is perfectly smooth and the flavors are creative but not gimmicky. Ordered online to ship to family out of province.
Stopped in while visiting the Falls and was so glad we did. Fresh, high-quality fudge made right in front of you. Great variety and friendly staff.
The sampler box made the perfect gift for my family in the UK — they were blown away by the maple walnut. Proper Canadian treat done right.
I've been visiting Niagara Falls for 20 years and this is consistently the best fudge shop on the strip. Never disappoints.
The ByWard Market is a Toronto institution and this shop is one of the best in it. The handmade pottery is stunning and the staff are passionate about local artists.
Great selection of locally made goods. The beeswax candles smell amazing and burn so cleanly. Good place to find meaningful gifts that support Ontario makers.
Bought an Indigenous art print here and it's the most beautiful thing in my apartment. The staff knew the artist personally and shared the story behind the work.
Great place to pick up Ottawa souvenirs that aren't tacky mass-produced stuff. The artisan jam set is delicious — especially the wild blueberry.
Every piece in this shop tells a story. I've furnished much of my cottage with finds from here over the years. The quality of craftsmanship is exceptional.
Wonderful shop for anyone who appreciates handmade goods. Good price range from affordable candles to investment-worthy art. A gem of the ByWard Market.
The Limestone IPA is one of the best craft IPAs in Ontario. Balanced bitterness with a lovely citrus finish. The taproom atmosphere is cozy and welcoming.
Absolutely love this brewery. The Rideau Dark Stout is smooth and complex without being overly heavy. Staff are passionate beer nerds who love talking about their craft.
Great local brewery that holds its own against the best in Ontario. The tasting flight is excellent value and the wheat ale is perfect for summer.
Came here on a trip to Kingston and left with two growlers. The seasonal sour was outstanding. Definitely worth making a point of visiting when you're in the area.
Solid craft brewery with consistently good beers. The taproom is well-designed with a nice view. A must-stop for beer lovers visiting Kingston.
The best brewery experience I've had in Ontario. Staff genuinely love what they do and it shows in every pint. The IPA and stout are both world-class.
Took a brewery tour and was blown away by the process and the passion of the team. The beer quality speaks for itself. Kingston should be proud.
Lovely taproom and excellent beers. The growler fills are great value. Only wish they had more food options but the beer more than makes up for it.
The guided sunset paddleboard tour was the highlight of our entire Muskoka trip. The guide was knowledgeable about the local ecosystem and the views were breathtaking.
Rented a canoe for the full day and explored inlets we never would have found on our own. Equipment was in excellent condition. Will definitely book again next summer.
Perfect activity for a Muskoka summer day. Staff were patient and encouraging with our group — some of us had never kayaked before. Highly recommend the beginner lesson.
The most memorable experience of our Ontario road trip. Crystal clear water, stunning scenery, and top-notch equipment. The sunset tour is absolutely magical.
Excellent rental experience. Booking was easy, pickup was smooth, and the kayak was in great shape. A bit pricey but you're paying for the Muskoka experience.
Brought my kids here for a family kayaking day and they haven't stopped talking about it. The staff were wonderful with the little ones and safety was clearly the priority.
I've been canoeing in Muskoka for decades and this is the best rental outfit around. Clean, well-maintained gear, knowledgeable staff, and honest pricing.
The guided eco-tour was educational and spectacular. Learned about the local flora and fauna while paddling through some of the most beautiful scenery in Canada.
Great experience overall. Would love if they offered longer guided tours as well. The half-day kayak rental was perfect for an afternoon adventure.
The industrial aesthetic matches perfectly with Hamilton's identity and the wine quality is genuinely excellent. The Niagara Riesling is crisp and refreshing.
Great spot on James Street North. The charcuterie board with Ontario cheeses was outstanding. The Steel City Red Blend is bold and satisfying.
A hidden gem in Hamilton's arts district. Knowledgeable staff who genuinely care about wine education. The tasting flight is an excellent way to explore their range.
Really enjoyed the atmosphere and the wine selection. Love that they focus on Ontario and Niagara wines. The charcuterie is exceptional quality.
One of the best wine bars I've visited in Ontario. The staff's passion for local wines is infectious. Will be making this a regular stop on visits to Hamilton.
Great wine bar with a thoughtful selection. The pairing of Ontario wines with local charcuterie is a winning concept. Good price point for the quality offered.
Found three rare pressings I'd been searching for for years. The owner clearly knows music deeply and the shop is organized in a way that makes discovery a joy.
This is what a record store should be. Warm, knowledgeable staff, incredible selection across all genres, and that perfect musty vinyl smell. A treasure in London.
Excellent selection of used vinyl at fair prices. Found some real gems in the jazz section. The new vinyl selection is also well-curated.
Stumbled in on a visit to London and spent three hours browsing. The cassette section is a nostalgia trip. Bought a cleaning kit and my whole collection sounds better now.
Great shop for vinyl enthusiasts. The staff will actually help you find what you're looking for instead of just pointing you to a section. Real music lovers here.
One of the best record shops in Ontario. Came in looking for one album and left with six. The curation is excellent and prices are more than fair.
An absolute must for any vinyl collector visiting London. The owner is a true music historian and the shop reflects that. Best record store experience I've had.
Finally a spice shop that carries authentic za'atar and proper smoked paprika. The sampler kit is a fantastic gift and everything smells incredibly fresh.
Great variety of spices at competitive prices. The owner clearly sources quality products. The saffron is genuine and worth every cent.
This shop has transformed my cooking. Access to 300+ spices including many I couldn't find anywhere else in Ontario. The blends they make in-house are exceptional.
Great selection of global spices. Found Mexican epazote and dried chiles I haven't seen anywhere else in Windsor. Staff are very helpful for cooking advice.
Bought the spice sampler as a holiday gift and received so many compliments. The packaging is beautiful and the quality of every spice in the set is outstanding.
The best outfitter in Northern Ontario, hands down. Staff have actually done the routes they recommend gear for. The sleeping bag I bought here has kept me warm at -15°C.
Good selection of quality gear. A bit pricier than online retailers but the staff expertise is worth it. They talked me out of a tent that wasn't right for my trip.
Geared up here for a backcountry Algonquin trip and everything performed flawlessly. The staff's knowledge of Northern Ontario conditions is invaluable.
Great shop for serious outdoor adventurers. The headlamp selection alone is impressive. Staff gave excellent advice for our kayaking trip on Lake Superior.
After 25 years of hiking in Northern Ontario, this is the only gear shop I trust. They stock brands that actually work in real Canadian conditions.
Well-stocked outdoor gear shop with knowledgeable staff. Found a tent I couldn't locate anywhere else in the province. Great resource for Sudbury's outdoor community.
The seasonal bouquets here are stunning. I've been a subscriber for 6 months and each week brings a completely different and gorgeous arrangement. Worth every penny.
Ordered a custom wedding centerpiece consultation and was blown away by the creativity and attention to detail. Our wedding flowers were the most complimented thing at the reception.
Wonderful floral workshop — went with my daughter and we both made beautiful arrangements to take home. Fun, relaxed atmosphere and the instructor was very talented.
The weekly subscription is a game changer for my home. Always fresh, always creative, and the florals brighten up my entire week. Excellent service.
Best florist in Mississauga. The bouquets are artistic and last longer than anything from a grocery store. So glad I found this place.
Got flowers for my wife's birthday and she loved them. Great quality and a beautiful presentation. The staff helped me pick the perfect arrangement.
The floral arrangement workshop was one of the best experiences I've had in Mississauga. Learned so much and left with a gorgeous bouquet. Will definitely come back.
The best South Asian grocery in Brampton. Fresh paneer made in-house is incomparably better than packaged. The produce selection is extensive and prices are very fair.
Finally a grocery store that stocks everything I need for authentic home cooking. The basmati rice is genuinely aged and makes all the difference in biryani.
Great selection and mostly great prices. The mango lassi is delicious and fresh. Would love to see more Sri Lankan specialty items but otherwise excellent.
This is my weekly grocery run. The quality of everything from dal to fresh vegetables is consistently excellent. Staff are helpful and the store is always clean.
One-stop shop for all South Asian cooking needs. The spice section is impressive. The paneer is the freshest I've found in the GTA. Highly recommend.
Reminds me of the markets back home. Everything is fresh, authentic, and reasonably priced. The mango lassi is the perfect treat after a long shopping trip.
My family refuses to shop anywhere else for our South Asian staples. Excellent quality across the board and they always have what we're looking for.
Great grocery store for the South Asian community in Brampton. The masala spice box is a great gift idea. Good value throughout.
Did The Heist for my sister's bachelorette and it was absolutely perfect. Genuinely challenging puzzles, amazing set design, and the game master was hilarious.
The Haunted Mansion room is genuinely scary and incredibly immersive. Best production value of any escape room I've done in Ontario. Already planning to come back.
Really fun escape room experience. The Space Station had creative puzzles that felt genuinely satisfying to solve. Good difficulty level for mixed-experience groups.
The birthday party package was absolutely incredible value. Two full rooms, a private lounge, and great staff who made the whole experience memorable.
I've done escape rooms across North America and this is among the top 5 I've ever experienced. The puzzles are creative and well-integrated into the story.
Really well-designed rooms with a good variety of puzzle types. Staff were helpful without giving away too much. Perfect team building activity for our office.
Brought a first-timer group here and everyone had a blast. The game masters are skilled at keeping everyone engaged. Will definitely return to try the remaining rooms.
Great escape room venue. The theming and props are high quality. The Haunted Mansion is definitely the standout — multiple genuine scares throughout.
Our corporate team absolutely loved this. Great problem-solving challenge that revealed so much about how people work together. Highly recommend for team events.
The pick-your-own experience here is magical. Wild blueberries have so much more flavor than store-bought. The jam they make on-site is absolutely incredible.
Brought my grandchildren here and it was the highlight of our summer. The farm tour was educational and the staff were wonderful with the kids. The pie is divine.
Beautiful property and genuinely delicious blueberries. The wild variety has a depth of flavor that's impossible to find in grocery stores. The jam makes wonderful gifts.
Worth the drive from Thunder Bay proper. The fresh-baked blueberry pie is one of the best desserts I've ever had. The farm tour is charming and informative.
A true Northern Ontario gem. The connection between the farm, the land, and the product is palpable. Left with multiple jars of jam and zero regrets.
The best Hakka food in the GTA. Chili chicken is crispy, saucy, and has the perfect amount of heat. This is the food I grew up eating and it's exactly right.
Manchurian gravy and Hakka noodles combo is absolutely unbeatable. Portions are generous and prices are very reasonable. This place is a Scarborough institution.
Delicious Indo-Chinese food. The Gobi 65 is crispy and well-spiced. Service is quick and friendly. A great spot for the whole family.
I travel from North York specifically for this place. The chili chicken here is on another level. Hakka cuisine is a Toronto treasure and this restaurant does it justice.
Really solid Hakka food. The noodles are perfectly stir-fried with a good wok char. Gets busy on weekends so arrive early or be prepared to wait.
Brought non-Indian friends here for their first Hakka experience and they were completely blown away. The manchurian gravy converted them instantly.
This is the most authentic Hakka kitchen in Scarborough. Every dish tastes homemade and the spice levels are adjustable. Perfect for the whole family.
The country sourdough loaf here has the most incredible crust and crumb structure I've found in Toronto. You can genuinely taste the 72-hour fermentation.
The morning bun is extraordinary — flaky, buttery, with that gorgeous orange sugar. I've been coming every Saturday since they opened and the quality never wavers.
Excellent artisan bakery. The seeded rye is dense and flavorful — perfect for open-faced sandwiches. Sells out fast so get there early!
Best sourdough in Toronto, period. The pain au chocolat is also world-class. The bakers clearly take enormous pride in what they do and it shows in every bite.
I converted from store-bought bread to artisan sourdough because of this bakery. The digestibility of properly fermented bread is real and I feel so much better.
Excellent bakery. The bread is genuinely artisan — small-batch, carefully crafted, and delicious. The croissants are some of the best in the west end.
This little bakery has changed my standards for bread forever. I can never go back to supermarket loaves. The morning bun is transcendent.
Proper artisan baking done with real skill and passion. The country loaf is fantastic and the pastries are outstanding. A genuine gem in Etobicoke.
Enrolled my daughter in the kids ballet program and she's thrived. The instructors are patient, encouraging, and technically excellent. Huge improvement in just 8 weeks.
Took the adult salsa beginner course and it was fantastic. The instructor made everyone feel comfortable and we made real progress by week 6. Great social atmosphere.
The hip hop classes here are energetic and so well-taught. As a complete beginner I was nervous but the instructor's welcoming approach put me at ease immediately.
Professional studio with genuinely talented instructors. My contemporary dance technique has improved massively. The 8-week session format is perfectly structured.
Great dance academy for all levels. Very clean facilities and well-organized scheduling. The drop-in trial class was a perfect way to try before committing.
Best dance studio in North York. The instructors genuinely care about each student's progress and create such a positive, supportive environment.
Commissioned a custom live edge coffee table and the result is absolutely stunning. The craftsmanship is impeccable and the owner kept me updated throughout the process.
The end-grain cutting board is a work of art. Beautiful to look at and incredibly functional. It was a wedding gift and the recipients were absolutely thrilled.
Excellent quality woodworking at fair prices. The charcuterie board is gorgeous and has become the centerpiece of every dinner party. Solid craftsmanship throughout.
Took the beginner woodworking workshop and it was such a special experience. Made a small shelf that I'm incredibly proud of. Excellent instruction and high-quality tools.
The attention to detail on my custom table is extraordinary. You can see the love that went into every joint and finish. This is what artisan craftsmanship looks like.
The fish and chips here with fresh Lake Ontario perch is absolutely phenomenal. The batter is light and crispy and the fish is so fresh. Best in Durham Region by far.
The lobster roll is an outstanding value for the quality of seafood. The waterfront view makes the whole experience even better. A summer must in Whitby.
Great seafood restaurant in a wonderful location. The Maritime chowder is rich and perfectly seasoned. Service was friendly and attentive.
The grilled salmon with lemon butter is cooked to absolute perfection. Fresh, flavorful, and beautifully presented. This restaurant is a true gem on the waterfront.
Excellent seafood and a beautiful location. The chowder is some of the best I've had in Ontario. Gets busy in summer so reservations are recommended.
Brought family from out of town here and everyone raved about it. The fresh Lake Ontario perch is a genuinely special ingredient you can't get everywhere. Outstanding.
The 15-piece omakase was a transcendent experience. Every nigiri was perfectly seasoned, perfectly portioned, and the chef's explanations of each fish added so much to the meal. Worth every cent.
Best sushi I've had outside of Japan. The wagyu nigiri course was absolutely extraordinary. This tiny counter is a hidden gem in Markham.
The omakase here rivals anything I've had in downtown Toronto. Seasonal ingredients, perfect knife work, and genuine hospitality from the chef.
Exceptional quality and creativity. The uni handroll was pure ocean bliss. Only reason for 4 stars is the price — but for what you get, it's honestly worth it.
Brought my wife for our anniversary and we were completely wowed. Intimate setting, personal service, and every piece was perfection.
As someone who grew up in Tokyo, finding this level of quality in Markham brought me genuine joy. The shari rice seasoning alone shows the chef's mastery.
The best 10-piece omakase deal anywhere in the GTA. Fresh, creative, and executed flawlessly. Will absolutely return.
The walls here are so well-designed for all skill levels. I've been climbing for 3 years and I'm always finding new challenges. Staff are incredibly supportive.
Started as a complete beginner with the 2-hour intro lesson and now I'm coming 4 times a week. Incredible community and the monthly membership is phenomenal value.
Great climbing gym with high quality holds and well-maintained walls. Rental gear is clean and in good shape. Very friendly staff who genuinely love climbing.
Best bouldering in the east GTA. The setting team is really creative and the problems are genuinely fun. The kids section is also brilliant.
Really well-run gym. The beginner lessons are structured perfectly. Gets busy on weekends but the facility is large enough to handle it.
My entire family climbs here now. From my 6-year-old to my 60-year-old father — there's something for everyone. Incredible facility.
Converted from another gym and never looking back. The community here is welcoming, the walls are challenging, and the day pass is very fairly priced.
Excellent climbing gym. The training area with hangboards and campus rungs is a fantastic addition. The auto-belay stations are always well-maintained.
The raw wildflower honey from Rouge Valley hives is extraordinary — complex floral notes you simply can't find in store-bought honey. A true artisan product.
The beekeeping experience was one of the most memorable afternoons I've had in the GTA. Suits provided, excellent guide, and tasting honey fresh from the hive is something else.
The creamed honey is the best I've ever tasted. Smooth, intensely flavored, and genuinely local. The honey and beeswax gift set is my new go-to gift.
Beautiful honey products with genuine local provenance. Love knowing exactly where it comes from. The creamed honey especially is worth buying in bulk.
Such a unique and wonderful business. The wildflower honey genuinely changes with the season. Bought 3 jars and already planning my next order.
Bought the gift set for my mom who keeps bees herself — she said it was some of the finest Canadian honey she'd tasted. High praise indeed!
Found my new favourite spot in Markham. Brilliant chess instruction, great coffee, and the atmosphere is unlike anything else in town. The junior program is exceptional.
Lovely concept — chess and café together works so well. My son has been coming to the junior chess course and has improved enormously. Highly recommend.
The private lessons with their top coach have genuinely transformed my game. Quiet, focused environment and the coffee is excellent. A genuinely special place.
Great community hub for chess enthusiasts. The tournaments are well-organized and the table fee is very fair for how long you can stay.
Brought my daughter here for her first chess lesson and she hasn't stopped playing since. Excellent instructors who make the game approachable and fun.
The family portrait session was absolutely incredible. Patient, creative, and the final images made us all cry happy tears. A true professional.

The ice fishing starter kit is excellent value and comes with everything you need. The staff gave thorough advice on technique and location.
The survival skills course is genuinely invaluable for anyone spending time in the Northern Ontario wilderness. Practical, thorough, and potentially life-saving knowledge.
Great gear shop for Northern Ontario conditions. They stock what actually works up here, not just popular brands from southern markets.
The guided fishing day was spectacular. The guide knew every productive spot on the lake and we had action almost constantly. Outstanding experience.
The birchbark baskets are extraordinary works of art. The craftsmanship reflects generations of traditional knowledge and the owner explained the techniques beautifully.
Purchased a pair of hand-beaded moccasins as a significant gift and the recipient was moved to tears. The craftsmanship is genuinely exceptional.
The wild rice is unlike anything from a store — nutty, chewy, and clearly hand-harvested with care. The dreamcatcher is also beautifully made.
A wonderful Indigenous-owned business that deserves all the support it gets. Every purchase contributes directly to First Nations artisans and communities.
The most meaningful shopping experience I've had in years. Beautiful, authentic pieces with real cultural significance. The owner's stories about each artist are treasures.
The hand-beaded moccasins are both art and function at the highest level. Worth every cent and will be treasured for generations.
The ghormeh sabzi is exactly as my mother made it in Tehran. The tartness of the dried limes, the richness of the lamb — this is the real thing.

Brought Persian friends here and they were thoroughly impressed. The ghormeh sabzi was declared the best outside of a home kitchen.
Wonderful Persian restaurant in Scarborough. The rosewater baklava with tea is a beautiful way to end a meal. Warm and welcoming service.

This restaurant brings genuine Persian home cooking to Scarborough. Every dish is made with care and the flavors are complex and authentic.
The multi-level arena here is genuinely impressive. The different game modes keep things interesting and the equipment is high quality. Kids loved it.
Really fun birthday party venue. The staff ran the party smoothly and all 12 kids had a fantastic time. Great value for the all-inclusive package.
The weekend unlimited pass is outstanding value. My nephews played for 4 hours straight and were still having fun. Great facility.
Well-run laser tag arena with good technology. The themed game modes are creative and the staff are enthusiastic. Great for groups.
One of the best laser tag experiences I've had anywhere. The multi-level design creates genuine tactical depth and the vests track scoring accurately.
Fun activity for a corporate team event. Staff were helpful in facilitating the group and the gameplay was engaging for all skill levels.
The birthday party package is excellent value. Pizza, private room, and 2 games — the kids were completely entertained and the parents were stress-free.
The hand-forged santoku is the finest knife I've ever owned. The VG-10 steel holds an edge remarkably well and the balance is perfect. Worth every cent.
Learned about Japanese knife sharpening at the workshop and completely transformed my cooking experience. The knives here are genuinely exceptional tools.

Excellent specialist knife shop. The sharpening service is exceptional and the owner clearly has deep knowledge of Japanese blade craft.

The toddler time sessions are brilliantly organized for little ones. Safe, well-supervised, and my 4-year-old was completely worn out after 45 minutes.
The birthday party package is the best value party option in Scarborough. Everything is organized and the kids went home exhausted and happy.
Fun for adults too, not just kids. The foam pits are irresistible and the ninja course is genuinely challenging. Good workout in disguise.
Really well-maintained facility. The trampolines are clean and in great condition. Staff are attentive to safety without being overbearing.
Great option for a rainy Scarborough afternoon. Kids were entertained for 90 minutes straight. The dodgeball zone was a particular hit.
The ninja course is one of the best I've seen at a trampoline park. Actually challenging and age-appropriate at the same time. Excellent design.
Good trampoline park with friendly staff. The unlimited weekend pass is great value if you can stay for 3+ hours which the kids definitely can.
The vada pav here is the most authentic I've had outside of Mumbai. The right potato filling, the right chutneys, the right bun. Genuinely perfect.
The pani puri experience here is interactive and delicious. The tamarind water has the perfect balance of sweet, sour, and spice. Just like home.

Great way to work on your game in winter. The simulators are accurate and the data they provide on your swing is genuinely useful for improvement.

The 60-minute lesson with a certified instructor on the simulator helped me diagnose issues I'd been struggling with for years. Excellent coaching.

Well-maintained simulators with good course selection. The bay rental by the hour is fair pricing. Great for keeping the game sharp year-round.

Genuinely addictive activity. The league night is surprisingly competitive and the community is welcoming to new throwers. Will keep coming back.
Did the corporate event here for our team of 18 and it was a massive success. Staff organized everything flawlessly and the energy was incredible.
Fun and safe axe throwing experience. The coaches are excellent at building confidence without pushing too hard. The venue itself is well-designed.
The walk-in coaching session made me feel competent within 20 minutes. Incredibly satisfying when the axe sticks. Will definitely return for league night.
The initial nutrition consultation was the most comprehensive health assessment I've ever received. The follow-up meal plan has genuinely transformed my energy levels.
The custom 4-week meal plan was worth every cent. Clear, realistic, and tailored to my lifestyle and goals. I've lost 12 lbs and feel fantastic.
Very professional practice. The nutritionist understood my health goals and created a plan that was challenging but achievable. Follow-up sessions are helpful.
The group nutrition workshop was incredibly informative. Learned practical things about food that I'm now applying daily. Very accessible presentation.
Excellent holistic nutrition practice. The consultation felt collaborative rather than prescriptive. The meal plan has been genuinely sustainable to follow.
The follow-up sessions are where the real value is. The nutritionist adapts the plan based on what's working and what isn't. Excellent ongoing support.
The best comic shop in Durham Region by a wide margin. Deep back issue selection, knowledgeable staff, and the trading card section is exceptional.
Great local comic shop. The Pokémon section is well-stocked and fairly priced. Staff actually know about the comics they're selling which makes a big difference.
Found a run of comics I'd been searching for for years. The staff knew exactly where to look and were enthusiastic about helping. This is what a comic shop should be.
Good selection of graphic novels at fair prices. The Funko Pop collection is well-curated. A solid local shop that deserves community support.
The staff knowledge is genuinely impressive — they recommended a graphic novel based on my tastes that became my new favourite. Personal service makes the difference.
Great spot for trading cards. The Pokemon selection is good and prices are fair. The single issue back issues are well-organized and easy to browse.
Durham Region's finest comic den. The selection across comics, cards, and collectibles is comprehensive and the atmosphere is wonderfully geeky.
The waterfront yoga with views of Lake Ontario is a genuinely special experience. The instructors have a gift for making outdoor practice feel sacred.
The sunrise yoga + coffee series is my new favourite weekend ritual. Nothing better than an early morning practice by the water followed by excellent coffee.
Beautiful setting for yoga. The waterfront classes have wonderful energy and the instructors are skilled and attentive. Monthly unlimited is great value.

The sunrise class on a clear morning with the lake as a backdrop is a life-affirming experience. Cannot recommend this enough for Burlington residents.
The combination of waterfront views, expert instruction, and a supportive community makes this the best fitness investment I've made in years.

Great café inside Hamilton's beloved market. The grilled cheese and tomato soup combination is comforting and perfectly executed. Good value.
The fresh fruit danish changes with the season and is always exceptional. The coffee is well-sourced and the market atmosphere makes every visit a pleasure.
The locally sourced smoothies are genuinely fresh — you can taste the difference from commercial alternatives. Great breakfast spot.
This café embodies everything wonderful about Hamilton's market culture. Honest food, local ingredients, and a warm community atmosphere.
The peameal bacon sandwich is fantastic — proper Canadian breakfast done with quality ingredients. The market setting adds a lovely authenticity.
The weekly veggie box has transformed how my family eats. Everything is harvested within 24 hours and you can taste the difference. The egg add-on is essential.
The farm tour with my kids was educational and inspiring. Seeing where our food comes from and meeting the farmers who grow it was genuinely moving.
The large veggie box is exceptional value. Fresh, seasonal, and beautifully diverse. I've cooked vegetables I'd never even heard of before.

The farm produces genuinely exceptional vegetables. The box contents have made me a much more adventurous and seasonal cook.
The farm tour for our family was one of the best educational experiences we've provided for our children. Seeing urban farming in practice was inspiring.

The botanical gin is exceptional — the local botanicals create a distinctly Waterloo Region character. The distillery tour was educational and fun.
Great craft distillery. The rye whisky rivals much older Canadian whiskies. The tasting flight is excellent value for the quality.

Excellent distillery with genuine terroir. The local grain sourcing makes a real difference to the spirit quality. Highly recommend the full tour.
The gin is extraordinary — complex without being busy, and distinctly Canadian. This distillery is putting Waterloo on the craft spirits map.
Really impressive operation for a craft distillery. Both the rye and the gin demonstrate genuine expertise in distilling. Well worth a Waterloo visit.
Took the cocktail making class as a birthday gift and it was perfect. Learned real technique and left with a new appreciation for craft spirits.

Excellent range of dealers with very different specialties. The vintage kitchenware section is outstanding for someone furnishing a period home.

Well-organized for a multi-dealer space. The antique jewelry selection is extensive and fairly priced. Friendly staff throughout.

The ski tune and wax service transformed my old skis. The edges are sharp and the wax appropriate for the conditions. Best service in the area.
Good selection of rental equipment. The snowboard boots fit well and the board performed excellently on Blue Mountain. Competitive pricing.

Reliable ski shop for all your Collingwood needs. Fast service, knowledgeable staff, and the rental equipment is always well-maintained.
The boot fitting and tune service completely transformed my skiing experience. Staff clearly love skiing and it shows in how they care for your equipment.
Best ski shop near Blue Mountain. Every piece of rental equipment was in excellent condition. Staff knowledge is genuinely expert-level.
The kids adventure camp here is outstanding — my 9-year-old spent a full day climbing, on the aerial course, and doing parkour. She talked about nothing else for a week.
The intro climbing course is perfectly designed for adults who've never climbed before. Patient instructors and high-quality safety equipment.
The all-facilities day pass is exceptional value for a full day of adventure. The aerial course is particularly impressive and genuinely challenging.
Great facility for Barrie. The monthly membership at $75 is remarkably good value for the amount of variety available. Well-maintained throughout.
My family has been coming here every week this summer. The variety of activities keeps everyone engaged regardless of age or ability level.
Solid adventure centre with friendly staff. The bouldering section is well-set and the parkour area is a great addition. Recommended for families.

Wonderful seafood restaurant in a great Midland location. The smoked trout spread is an excellent starter and the chowder is warming and rich.
The whitefish tacos are brilliant — fresh local fish with a well-seasoned slaw and the perfect amount of heat. Best tacos in Georgian Bay country.
Really great local seafood restaurant. The emphasis on Georgian Bay fish makes it genuinely special — local, fresh, and prepared with skill.
Came specifically for the pickerel after a recommendation and it exceeded expectations. The simplicity of the preparation lets the fish quality shine.
The sugar shack breakfast is the quintessential Ontario experience. All-you-can-eat pancakes with fresh maple syrup in a log cabin — genuinely magical.
The maple taffy on snow is pure joy regardless of your age. My grandchildren and I had an identical experience of pure happiness when the hot maple hit the snow.
The sugar shack tour is educational and charming. Understanding the maple production process made the breakfast taste even better. Wonderful family outing.

The all-you-can-eat pancake breakfast is hearty and delicious. The maple syrup is clearly fresh and excellent. Live music on weekends adds so much atmosphere.
The complete sugar shack experience — tour, taffy, breakfast — is one of the best spring traditions Ontario offers. Exceptional quality throughout.

The Neapolitan technique here is absolutely authentic — the char on the crust, the perfect chew, the simplicity of the margherita DOC. Outstanding pizza.

Really impressive Neapolitan pizza. The wood-fired oven produces a crust that you simply can't replicate at home. Worth the drive from Toronto.

The hydrafacial produced the clearest, most even skin I've had since my 20s. The Aurora clinic team is professional, knowledgeable, and genuinely results-focused.
The laser hair removal sessions here are remarkably effective. Noticeable reduction after just 3 sessions. Well-priced for the level of expertise.
The Botox treatment here was subtle and natural-looking. The injector took real time to understand what I wanted and delivered exactly that.
Professional medical aesthetics clinic with a clinical but caring approach. The chemical peel has genuinely improved my skin texture.
The hydrafacial is the best treatment I've discovered for my combination skin. Immediate and lasting results. I won't go anywhere else now.
Excellent laser hair removal results after a full course of treatment. Professional, clinical, and well-priced compared to Toronto clinics.
The baklava here is extraordinary — the rosewater and pistachio balance is perfection and the phyllo is shatteringly crispy. Best Persian sweets in the GTA.
The sohan brings back memories of Isfahan immediately. The saffron aroma, the crunchy brittle texture — authentic at the highest level.
The Persian sweets gift box is my go-to for special occasions. Always beautifully presented and the quality impresses everyone who receives one.
The gaz nougat is perfectly chewy with pistachio pieces and a delicate rosewater character. Authentic Persian confection done exactly right.

Excellent Persian sweet shop. The rotating seasonal offerings are particularly exciting. The gift boxes are always elegantly packaged.

The hojicha soft serve is hauntingly delicious — roasted and slightly smoky, rich without being heavy. The wagashi are beautifully presented.
The matcha tasting flight is genuinely educational. Understanding the quality differences between grades made me much more selective in my purchases.

Excellent Japanese café concept. The ceremonial matcha preparation is done with real care and knowledge. The hojicha soft serve is outstanding.

The matcha education flight changed how I think about green tea. Three completely different taste profiles from the same plant at different quality levels.
The beginner salsa course here is the best structured dance program I've taken anywhere. By week 8 I could actually dance and feel confident. Outstanding teaching.
The social dance nights are the best in Markham. Great music, welcoming community, and the instructors are on hand to help you practice what you've learned.
The couples private lesson for bachata was perfectly tailored to our level. Our instructor made connection and footwork accessible and fun.
This studio has the best Latin dance instruction in the GTA outside of downtown Toronto. The atmosphere is warm and the standard of teaching is exceptional.
The drop-in classes are well-structured for all levels. I've been to many Latin dance studios and this one consistently produces the best results.
The kizomba classes here are rare in Markham and taught at a genuinely high level. My partner and I have been coming weekly for 4 months.
The social dance night has become my favourite Saturday evening. Great music, lovely community, and I keep getting better every week. Highly recommend.
The board game selection here is extraordinary — 300+ games across every genre. The table fee is completely worth it and the food is genuinely good.
Spent 5 hours here on a rainy Sunday and it felt like 1. The staff are genuinely knowledgeable about recommending games based on group size and preference.
Great concept perfectly executed. The nachos are legitimately delicious — not just cafeteria-level afterthought food. The private event room is excellent.
The private event package is the best option for a birthday gathering in Markham. Unlimited games, food, and space for 20 people at a very fair price.
Love this place. The rotating craft beer selection pairs well with a long session of board gaming. Staff are helpful at teaching new games.
Found three new favourite board games here through staff recommendations. The table fee model encourages you to try things you wouldn't normally buy.
The best non-gaming reason to come is the nachos. But the gaming selection is also truly exceptional. A Markham gem.
Great game café. The atmosphere is relaxed and welcoming. The wide variety of game categories means every group finds something perfect.
The mango pomelo sago here is the definitive version in Markham. The mango is always perfectly ripe and the sago texture is exactly right.
The egg waffle is sensational — puffy, eggy, slightly crispy. Exactly as I remember from the Hong Kong street markets. Outstanding authenticity.
